Event: You were rejected from a job you really wanted.

Event:
* Got on antidepressants for around 4 or 5 years
* Lost someone I really loved due to the impact of anxiety and depression
* Ruined friendships and relationships due to panic attacks, general anxiety, fits of rage, and saying things I don't mean but can't take back.
* Realized how shitty of a person I am, how selfish I am, and how I've ruined every good relationship and friendship in my life.
* Started hanging out with people occasionally out of loneliness despite not really liking them.
* Parents don't believe me when I say I have no friends where I live.
* Goal is to get off antidepressants and rebuild one's life, but struggling with hopelessness and feeling like one's life is over at 23 years old.
Post: Feeling like a complete failure at 23... I've ruined every good relationship and friendship in my life due to my anxiety and depression. I've lost someone I really loved because of my mental health issues. I'm so selfish and shitty, I can't even keep friends. My parents don't believe me when I say I have no friends where I live. I'm on antidepressants for 4/5 years now and it feels like I'm stuck in this rut forever. I'm trying to rebuild my life but feeling hopeless. #mentalhealth #anxiety #depression"

Event: Having social anxiety, severe depression, and anger; feeling miserable and wanting to enjoy life; goal of getting a girlfriend; having hives called cholinergic urticaria; taking antihistamine and exercising to help hives but they are still there and creeping back; seeing psychologists and therapists but it doesn't help; taking Paxil but still feeling depressed; wanting to work from home or on the computer; dream job of making YouTube videos but feeling unentertaining due to severe depression and anger.
Post: "Why can't I just shake off these negative feelings?! 😩 Despite my best efforts, I still struggle with social anxiety, depression, and anger. It feels like no matter what I do, I'll never be good enough for anyone... especially when it comes to finding a girlfriend 💔 My hives are still creeping back, and no amount of antihistamine or exercise seems to help 😩 I've tried seeing psychologists and therapists, but their advice doesn't seem to stick 🤷‍♂️ And don't even get me started on my medication - Paxil just isn't doing anything for me 😔 All I want is to work from home or make YouTube videos, but my severe depression and anger make me feel unentertaining 😞 #SevereDepression #Anxiety #Anger #Hives #CholinergicUrticaria #Paxil #MentalHealthStruggles"
